news.heading: Sur Runs for FH President (and SCP RP Owner)

text.p1:
On August 6, 2025

, the Factions Hub Council officially announced Sur's candidacy for FH President.
text.p2: The campaign launch took place in the newly proposed SCP 682 Containment Chamber.
text.p3: Construction is expected to start soon, pending zero coup attempts. And to be clear: Sur is not becoming a dictator.

text.p2: The budget is set at <big>100M</big> credits, approved on <mark>August 25</mark>.

text.p1: In a surprising turn of events, the council unanimously approved new democratic measures.
text.p2: This includes a ban on dictator towers and the introduction of mandatory voting memes.
